body:
Update OD 
Set OD.SetRangeDSName = 'PV06_UrunOlcuBirimDonusum',
	OD.SetRangeKeyField =  'DonusumOlcuBirimID',
	OD.SetRangeResultField = 'DonusumOlcuBirimKodu'
From  IT15_ObjectsM OM INNER JOIN  IT15_ObjectsD OD On OD.ITObjectID = OM.ITObjectID
Where  OD.ITObjectID  =19883 And OD.ShowSiraNo  = 57 And OD.ITObjectDID  =228366

Update ODF 
Set  ODF.SourceFieldName = 'UrunTID' ,ODF.DestFieldName  =  'UrunTID', Mandatory  =1
From  IT15_ObjectsM OM INNER JOIN  IT15_ObjectsD OD On OD.ITObjectID = OM.ITObjectID
INNER JOIN IT15_ObjectsDFilter ODF On ODF.ITObjectDID = OD.ITObjectDID
Where  OD.ITObjectID  =19883 And OD.ShowSiraNo  = 57 And OD.ITObjectDID  =228366
